name: Santa Claus Call You
description:
Ho Ho Ho !!!
Santa Claus Call You by click on fake Get Call button and make fun with your friends/Kids. Santa Claus Call You is an app for fun.

How to Play Santa Claus Call You ?

- Get Apps
- Choose Santa Photo And Click Get Call Button
- You Receive Call and Click to Green Button to Accept Call and enjoy.

This is not a real Call and only an imitation! This is only Just for fun!
